function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of wastewater management in the standard","Impact":"Uncontrolled wastewater can lead to the spread of waterborne diseases and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Incorporate wastewater management measures to treat and dispose of wastewater safely","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, sewage treatment plants","People":"Building occupants, local community, environment","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building management"},{"Description":"Inadequate water quality testing and treatment","Impact":"Risk of waterborne diseases due to inadequate testing for contaminants and bacteria in the water","Mitigation":"Conduct regular and comprehensive water quality testing, implement water treatment methods","Technologies":"Water testing kits, water filtration systems, water treatment chemicals","People":"Building occupants, local community","Owner":"Building management, water quality experts"},{"Description":"Lack of pandemic-resilient indicators in the standard","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Incorporate pandemic-resilient indicators such as infection control measures, air quality management, and public health promotion","Technologies":"HVAC systems with air purification, UV disinfection, public health signage","People":"Building occupants, visitors, local community","Owner":"Architects, building management"}]}
